answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The probable causes for itchiness could be diabetes mellitus, eczema, tineapedis (fungal infection) and psoriasis. It could be due to iron deficiency anemia, liver and kidney disorders, thyroid disorders and polycythemia. It could also be due to certain medications and food. Others could be due to skin conditions like contact dermatitis and scabies. In contact dermatitis exposure to an irritant like a chemical or metal or anything you are allergic to, can cause rash and itching. You may need to consult a your doctor  who will examine you and may ask for blood tests and in addition examine the scrapings from the skin to arrive at a diagnosis for appropriate therapy.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
